payload.title: ExecutionRecord Complete - Factory + Validator + Tests
payload.description: Implement complete ExecutionRecord with factory (createExecutionRecord), validator (validateExecutionRecordDetailed, isExecutionRecord, validateFullExecutionRecord) and comprehensive EARS tests. Includes auto-generated types and crypto module integration.
payload.notes: ExecutionRecord implemented as universal event stream to record work acts. Factory with ID generation from title, validator with schema + checksum + signatures, 16 EARS tests covering all cases. Types regenerated from YAML schema.
